p: Zingiber moran is a local ginger variety endemic to the northeast Indian region, rich in camphene, citral, and linalool [ 54]. Zingiber wrayi var. Halabala C.K. Lim, a local herb from the Bala Forest in Narathiwat (Thailand), was investigated for its EO composition. Four compounds including trans-anethole (96.5%), estragol, camphor and m-phenylphenol [ 62].
